game.name: SEARCH ALL - MUSHROOMS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mushrooms in a large location. Mushrooms will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mushrooms in a large location. Mushrooms will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

reviewHighlights.text: I've played all of these so far... but this is the first one I cannot recommend: some of the mushrooms are so small that even at full magnification, i...
The "Search All" series is a good set of games if finding things style games are for you, if not then why are you even looking at this? Do not get me...
